articles.description: Minnesota is averaging 33 deaths a day and has reached unseen death counts six days this month. November already accounts for 20% of the 3,082 deaths so far.
articles.content:
Seventy-two more people have died of COVID-19, Minnesota health officials reported Thursday, setting yet another grim daily record for fatalities in a pandemic that promises to only get worse.
